title: RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12015 Vibration Detection Module Overview
content: The RAK12015, a part of WisBlock Sensor, is a Vibration Detection Module that uses a high-precision sensor, the ANT-801S. This sensor is capable of detecting micro shocks or vibration without direction limits.
parent_content: The RAK12015, a part of WisBlock Sensor, is a Vibration Detection Module that uses a high-precision sensor, the ANT-801S. This sensor is capable of detecting micro shocks or vibration without direction limits.

title: RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module > Prerequisites > RAK12015 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12015**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12015** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12015**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12015** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
